import React from 'react'; import classes from './BottomBar.css'; import Radium from 'radium'; let style = { width: '100%', height: '125px', marginTop: '600px' } const bottomBar = (props) => { if (props.theme){ style.marginTop = '0px' } else { style.marginTop = '600px' } return (
